comments.en:
This is a driver developed for the Minolta magicolor 2300 DL network color laser printer.

It is possible that this driver will also work for the HP LaserJet 1000 and other Zenographics-based printers, but the author cannot test this.

The driver includes pregenerated PPD's and proper foomatic data; if in doubt use those instead of downloading a PPD etc from this website.
